message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $95. I believe this price reflects the value you'll receive while allowing us to maintain a fair profit margin. Looking forward to your response!
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. I'm willing to make a fair offer, but I have to stay within my budget.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. In light of your proposal, I would like to extend an offer of $90 for the product. This price still allows us to maintain a reasonable profit while being competitive in the market.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget with your latest offer. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $87.50. Can we meet at this price?
